tokens.definition: בָּבֶל Bâbel, baw-bel'; from H1101 ; confusion; Babel (i.e. Babylon), including Babylonia and the Babylonian empire:—Babel, Babylon. Note by BLB: Strong's entry lists the pronunciation of this word with the "b" sound. This is incorrect. The ב (bet) does not have a daghesh lene so it is pronounced with a "v" sound. This is why the transliteration has a bar under the "b" (ḇ).

tokens.definition: בָּבֶל Bâbel, baw-bel'; from H1101 ; confusion; Babel (i.e. Babylon), including Babylonia and the Babylonian empire:—Babel, Babylon. Note by BLB: Strong's entry lists the pronunciation of this word with the "b" sound. This is incorrect. The ב (bet) does not have a daghesh lene so it is pronounced with a "v" sound. tokens.definition: בָּבֶל Bâbel, baw-bel'; from H1101 ; confusion; Babel (i.e. Babylon), including Babylonia and the Babylonian empire:—Babel, Babylon. Note by BLB: Strong's entry lists the pronunciation of this word with the "b" sound. This is incorrect. The ב (bet) does not have a daghesh lene so it is pronounced with a "v" sound. tokens.definition: בָּבֶל Bâbel, baw-bel'; from H1101 ; confusion; Babel (i.e. Babylon), including Babylonia and the Babylonian empire:—Babel, Babylon. Note by BLB: Strong's entry lists the pronunciation of this word with the "b" sound. This is incorrect. The ב (bet) does not have a daghesh lene so it is pronounced with a "v" sound. verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord; Behold, I will punish Shemaiah the Nehelamite, and his seed: he shall not have a man to dwell among this people; neither shall he behold the good that I will do for my people, saith the Lord; because he hath taught rebellion against the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
32Therefore thus saith the Lord; Behold, I will punish Shemaiah the Nehelamite, and his seed: he shall not have a man to dwell among this people; neither shall he behold the good that I will do for my people, saith the Lord; because he hath taught rebellion against the Lord. ▼
▼ rebellion: Heb. revolt
